allBanks.name: All Banks
allBanks.desc: All the banks that will be used by the game. One bank path per line.

preloadBanks.name: Preload Banks
preloadBanks.desc: The banks that will be preloaded. One bank path per line.

preloadBanksNonBlocking.name: Load Banks (Non Blocking)
preloadBanksNonBlocking.desc: The banks that will be loaded as soon as possible but will not prevent the game from starting. One bank path per line.

autoSuspend.name: Auto Suspend
autoSuspend.desc: Automatically suspend FMOD when the game is suspended. Disable this if you want to control the suspend state manually.

SetBusMuted.description: Set the muted state of the specified FMOD bus.

muted.name: Muted
muted.desc: The muted state of the bus

SetBusPaused.description: Set the paused state of the specified FMOD bus.

paused.name: Paused
paused.desc: The paused state of the bus

SetBusVolume.description: Set the volume of the specified FMOD bus.

StopAllBusEvents.display-text: Stop all events from bus [i]{0}[/i] with fade out: [i]{1}[/i]
StopAllBusEvents.description: Stop all events of the specified FMOD bus.

allowFadeOut.name: Allow Fade Out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

InstantiateEvent.description: Instantiate the specified FMOD event. This doesn't start it. Use this when you need to change the event parameters before starting it.

ReleaseEventInstance.description: Release the specified FMOD event instance.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

SetEventPaused.description: Set the paused state of the specified FMOD event.

tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

timelinePosition.name: Timeline Position
timelinePosition.desc: The timeline position of the event instance

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

destroyWhenStopped.name: Release
destroyWhenStopped.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag on the next tick

StartEventAtObject.display-text: Start event [i]{0}[/i] with tag [i]{2}[/i] at object [i]{1}[/i] (destroy: {3}, forward mode: {4}, autoUpdate: [i]{5}[/i], autoVelocity: [i]{6}[/i])
StartEventAtObject.description: Start the specified FMOD event at the specified object.

object.name: Object
object.desc: The object to start the event at

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The tag of the event instance

destroyWhenStopped.name: Release
destroyWhenStopped.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag on the next tick

autoUpdate.name: Auto Update
autoUpdate.desc: Automatically update the event's position and orientation with the object

autoVelocity.name: Auto Velocity
autoVelocity.desc: Automatically update the event's velocity with the object

StartOneTimeEvent.description: Start the specified FMOD event as a one-time event. This instance will be released immediately.

StopAllEventInstances.display-text: Stop all events [i]{0}[/i] (allow fade out: [i]{1}[/i], release: [i]{2}[/i])

allowFadeOut.name: Allow fade out
allowFadeOut.desc: Allow fade out for the events

release.name: Release
release.desc: Releasing this event will free its memory when it stops playing and will remove it from the tag.

hasSeparateAttenuationPosition.desc: Whether to use separate attenuation position

attenuation-y.name: Attenuation Y

SetEventParameter.display-text: Set event parameter [i]{2}[/i] on event [i]{0}[/i] with tags [i]{1}[/i] to [i]{3}[/i] (ignore seek speed: [i]{4}[/i])

value.name: Value

ignoreSeekSpeed.name: Ignore seek speed
ignoreSeekSpeed.desc: Whether to ignore the parameter's seek speed and set the value immediately

SetEventParameterWithLabel.description: Set a parameter value for the specified FMOD event, using the parameter label instead of the parameter name.

value.name: Value

ignoreSeekSpeed.name: Ignore seek speed
ignoreSeekSpeed.desc: Whether to ignore the parameter's seek speed and set the value immediately
